subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Alana Beard scored 28 points, Nakia Sanford had 16, and the Washington Mystics held on for a 78-75 victory over the Liberty on Thursday night at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Alana Beard scored 28 points, Nakia Sanford had 16, and the Washington Mystics held on for a 78-75 victory over the Liberty on Thursday night at Madison Square Garden.
